cards.title: Real Embassy Flow
cards.body: Practice the way officers interview—short, direct questions, timed answers, and follow-ups that react to what you say.

cards.title: USA & UK Tracks Only
cards.body: Laser-focused prep for U.S. F-1 and UK Student Route. Country-specific question banks and scoring rubrics kept up to date.

cards.title: Adaptive AI Interviewer
cards.body: AI listens via AssemblyAI, understands your answer, and pivots with realistic follow-ups (finances, ties, study plan, intent). No scripts—every session feels new.

cards.title: Body-Language Insights
cards.body: On-device TF.js checks posture, gaze, and movement. See a confidence score with cues: sit tall, maintain eye contact, reduce fidgeting.

cards.title: Fast, Private, Browser-Only
cards.body: No installs. Works on typical broadband. Your recordings stay under your control with clear privacy settings and exportable reports.
